check.name: RequireThis
check.description: A frame initiated on entering a for block; holds local for variable names. <EOF>

property.name: checkFields
property.description: Control whether to check references to fields.

property.name: checkMethods
property.description: Control whether to check references to methods.

property.name: validateOnlyOverlapping
property.description: Control whether to check only overlapping by variables or arguments.
